name: CL_RMT_SVC_LVL_REF
description: This table contains information relating to the Administrative Reference Number (REF) segment on the service line level.

columns.name: IMAGE_ID
columns.description: This is the ID for the remittance image record with related remit claim references.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number in the results of a query.  Each instance of claim remit information will have its own line.

columns.name: REF_SVC_LN
columns.description: This is the service line for reference segment.

columns.name: SVC_REF_ID_QUAL_C_NAME
columns.description: This is the service line level reference segment ID qualifier.
entries: National association of boards of pharmacy number
Health care financing administration national provider identifier

columns.name: SVC_REF_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: This is the service line level reference segment Identifier.
